name: transfermarkt_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Transfermarkt in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.responsive-table tbody tr, .large-8 tbody tr').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/profil/"], a[href*="/startseite/"], td.hauptlink a'); const posEl = el.querySelector('.inline-table tr:last-child td, td:nth-child(2)'); const valueEl = el.querySelector('.rechts a, td.rechts'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href ? 'https://www.transfermarkt.com' + nameEl.getAttribute('href') : '', position: posEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', market_value: valueEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('query') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
